Candidate Company â™¦ How to post a job offer?\n\nTo post a job offer, you must first be registered as a company on the platform. If you already have an account, log in and click the "Post Job Offer" button. Complete the form with the offer details and click "Publish". \n\nâ™¦ How to search for job offers?\n\nTo search for job offers, you can use the search bar on the main page of featured offers. You can also save searches and receive alerts for new offers that meet your criteria.\n\n â™¦ How can I send my CV to an offer?\n\nTo apply for a job offer, you must have a candidate user account at our platform. Click on the offer you are interested in and follow the instructions to submit your request. The company will receive your CV and any other additional information you have provided. ðŸ”¹ Help ðŸ”¹ ðŸ”¹ About ðŸ”¹ ðŸ”¸ Our job offers management platform is an initiative that aims to facilitate the connection between companies and professionals in search of employment.\n\n ðŸ”¸ With a wide variety of offers available in different categories and sectors, our goal is to offer an intuitive and efficient user experience to meet the needs of all our users. \n\nðŸ”¸ We strive to offer a high-quality service and are committed to guaranteeing the privacy and security of all information and data handled on our platform. If you have any suggestions or comments on how we can improve our service, please do not hesitate to contact us.\n\nThank you for choosing our platform to find your next ideal job or candidate!
